title.rendered: “IDF and Security Agencies Arrest 14 in Overnight Raids: Weapons Seized Across Judea and Samaria”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF soldiers, along with SHABAK (Israel Security Agency) and Border Police, arrested 14 wanted individuals overnight throughout Judea and Samaria, confiscating numerous weapons.

The forces operated throughout Judea and Samaria during the night, arresting 14 wanted individuals and confiscating several weapons.

In the Qalandia camp in the Binyamin region, the soldiers located and confiscated three weapons. An additional weapon was found in the village of Anata. Furthermore, in the city of Shechem (Nablus) in the Samaria region, the forces found and confiscated a Carlo-type submachine gun.

The arrested individuals and the confiscated weapons were transferred for further action to the security forces; no injuries were reported among our forces.

So far, since the beginning of the war, approximately 2,990 wanted individuals have been arrested throughout the Judea and Samaria Division and the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade, over 1,350 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.

Attached is a video documenting the forces’ operations: https://bit.ly/47ZNoPr

Attached are photographs of the forces’ operations: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC31012024957972
